About SciVerse

SciVerse is an interactive digital learning platform developed by the Bicol University Science Alliance Club, designed to support Grade 7-10 students in their science education journey.

Aligned with the MATATAG Science Curriculum, SciVerse transforms traditional learning through engaging lessons, visual diagrams, interactive quizzes, and hands-on activities that bring science concepts to life.

Our mission is to make science accessible, enjoyable, and meaningful for every learnerempowering students to explore, discover, and develop a lifelong passion for scientific inquiry.

Developed by Bicol University Science Alliance Club
Academic Year 2025-2026
